The summer season at Ross’s Landing continues with Fourteen Saturdays of Summer—a beloved Chattanooga tradition running from Memorial Day weekend through Labor Day. Each Saturday evening features free live music under the stars, spotlighting an exciting mix of tribute bands and original artists across genres.

Bring a blanket or camp chair, grab a bite from local food vendors, and enjoy the riverfront setting with family, friends, or your pup (on a leash). Arrive early to claim your spot—music starts at 7:00 pm, with vendors open from 6:00 to 10:00 pm.

2025 Lineup:

May 31st: ON THE BORDER: THE ULTIMATE EAGLES TRIBUTE and FRESH MIND
June 7th: SHADOWGRASS and RANDY STEELE & THE HIGH COLD WIND
June 14th: PAUL THORN BAND and CALL ME SPINSTER
June 21st: SOUL SACRIFICE: A SANTANA TRIBUTE and ROCK AND SKATE
June 28th: KANIN WREN’S TAYLOR SWIFT EXPERIENCE and THE NEON QUEEN: AN ABBA TRIBUTE
July 5th: BOOT SCOOTIN’ BOOGIE NIGHTS: 90s COUNTRY and HARD LUCK
July 12th: BACK 2 MAC: A TRIBUTE TO FLEETWOOD MAC and DOCK PARTY
July 19th: PANDORA’S BOX: ULTIMATE AEROSMITH TRIBUTE and THE ESSENTIALS
July 26th: THE KINGS OF QUEEN: THE TOP QUEEN TRIBUTE and WAYWARD HEARTS
August 2nd: PURPLE MADNESS: A TRIBUTE TO PRINCE and LE GATO
August 9th: YACHT ROCK SCHOONER and SWAYYVO
August 16th: DIZGO and JAWNRA
August 23rd: WHO’S BAD: THE ULTIMATE MICHAEL JACKSON EXPERIENCE and PAUL CHILDERS
August 30th: THE BROTHERHOOD: A DOOBIE BROTHERS TRIBUTE and RICK RUSHING & THE BLUES STRANGERS

Visit the official event site for more info and updates.
